Source Russian Bluray

Encode:
Got this Russian Bluray very early, like all this russian blurays they are a bit unsharp and colourless, 
which i fixed best i could.
Added brightness,sharpness,rgb,and removed some interlace.
The Bluray had English DTS Audio on it, but no useful subs for the foreign parts.
So i harcoded my manually adjusted subs from the one i got from the r5 and from imagines version too. still thx imagine

Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1800 2pass
Audio: English DTS to AC3 5.1 @448
Sample: yes included
Subs: yes english hardcoded for the foreign parts only[/b]
